ing: 2 (4 ounce) jars diced pimento peppers, drained
1/2 (16 ounce) jar creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
des: "I just threw this together one day for a party where I knew there wouldn't be any sandwiches for us non meat eaters.  Definitely not for the Vegan.  This is a quick and yummy alternative to store bought pimento cheese spread."
ins: In a medium bowl combine Cheddar cheese, Colby cheese, pimentos, creamy salad dressing, salt and pepper.  Add more or less creamy salad dressing to achieve desired texture.  Mix well.
